description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Come on down to the checkers lounge and enjoy a relaxing massage while competing against the world's greatest! Play against the AI or against an online opponent in an epic checkers showdown. Climb the global high scores list and show the world just how good you are!
